description:

Now, approaching nearly two decades, it’s been officially announced that Final Destination: Bloodlines will arrive in 2025. The long-awaited sixth installment in the Final Destination saga will be hitting theaters as soon as May 16, 2025. What’s exciting about this project, [...]

title: ‘Final Destination: Bloodlines’ Gets 2025 Release Date

description:
In 2008, Ben Stiller saw the release of his film Tropic Thunder, which he co-wrote, directed, and starred in. Now, sixteen years later, Stiller doesn’t believe the film could get made today. In fact, he adds that “edgier comedy is just harder to do” in general today. Stiller made these comments regarding his controversial satirical [...]

The post Ben Stiller Says ‘Tropic Thunder’ Couldn’t Get Made Today appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Ben Stiller Says ‘Tropic Thunder’ Couldn’t Get Made Today

description:
It’s not exactly something that anyone expected to see when the movie Smile was first released in 2022. However, director Parker Finn successfully launched a new horror franchise with the release of the film. Fans not only received a sequel, Smile 2, this year – but now it looks like Smile 3 is also on [...]

title: ‘Smile 3’ Reportedly Begins Production In 2025
